Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:15RV.name: _save()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:15RV.abstract: This is a private method that saves the current contents of the _values Dictionary to persistent storage, keyed by the value of the key property.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:15RV.name: _load()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:15RV.abstract: This is a private method that reads in the data from persistent storage for this instance (using the key property), and loads the _values Dictionary property.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:15RV.name: lastError

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:15RV.name: keys

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:15RV.name: values

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html.name: RVS_PersistentPrefs
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html.abstract: This class is designed to act as an abstract base class, providing a simple Dictionary datastore that is stored in the UserDefaults in the Application Bundle. It is designed to be reliable, and extremely simple to use.

Classes/RVS_MediaServer_AppDelegate.html.abstract: This class implements the main application delegate.

Classes/RVS_MediaServer_HTTPServerManage.abstract: This is a model for the server status screen. It handles the management of the actual ffmpeg instance, and any HTTP server we set up.
